description:
Travel + Leisure 2010 World's Best Awards: #1 Large City Hotel - Continental U . and Canada

Poised along the Chicago River at the juncture of the Loop and North Michigan Avenue, Trump International Hotel and Tower Chicago is downtown's most enviable address, joining a list of landmarks, including the Magnificent Mile, Chicago River and Millennium Park .

From the outside, Trump International Hotel and Tower is a soaring composition of polished stainless steel and iridescent-tinted glass . For guests, the interiors are equally impressive with spacious contemporary styled accommodations starting at over 500 sq ft, with 10 ft floor to ceiling windows showcasing unobstructed lake, river or city views . Whether it is rejuvenation or simply a tranquil haven you seek, the Spa at Trump offers 23,000 sq ft of unique Spa experience . Workout on the latest cardiovascular and strength training equipment or take a relaxing swim in hotel's 75 ft long heated indoor pool . Eleven Spa treatment rooms offer a full array of massages, facials and treatments .

Others Amenities like Ballroom, Dry cleaning, Smoke-free hotel and Lobby are also provided by this property .

Remarks:

Complimentary high speed internet access and local phone calls .

All cancellations must be received prior to 3pm one day prior to arrival to avoid a charge of one night's room and tax .

description:
Conveniently located downtown in a 52-story landmark tower designed by renowned architect Mies van der Rohe, The Langham, Chicago is just minutes away from the boutique-lined boulevards of Chicago's retail hub and within walking distance to many of the city's premier tourist sites .

The Langham, Chicago features 316 luxurious guest rooms and suites . Starting from 516 ft, these are among the most spacious in the city .

The distinctive dining options at The Langham, Chicago are suited to both business and leisure travelers . Located on the hotel's second floor, Travelle's modern David Rockwell design is a splendid backdrop for Chef Tim Graham's contemporary take on Mediterranean cuisine served throughout the day and Pavilion features Tiffin at The Langham, the brand's signature afternoon tea that originated at The Langham, London .

The Langham, Chicago also features 15,000 ft of private event space spanning 12 function rooms, ranging from the expansive Devonshire Ballroom to four elegantly appointed boardrooms .

The hotel is also home to Chuan Spa, where guests can indulge in signature wellness and holistic treatments as well as a swimming pool, fitness center and innovative relaxation facilities .

Check-in Age: Guest must present identification and be 21 years of age or older to check-in . .

description: Discover a haven of urban sophistication among downtown hotels in Chicago at the Courtyard Chicago Downtown/River North Hotel. Located in the trendy River North area on famed Restaurant Row, this hotel in downtown Chicago, IL offers easy access to fine dining, exciting nightlife and close proximity to the EL Train. Dine at in-house restaurant Davanti Enoteca to taste authentic, rustic Italian, or grab a gourmet doughnut and coffee at Glazed & Infused. Experience the Windy City from the modern comforts of oversized downtown Chicago, IL hotel rooms offering plush bedding and amenities. For those looking to stay fit on the road, the fitness center with indoor pool sets this hotel in downtown Chicago, Illinois apart from the rest. Plan accordingly with technologically adept meeting space, ideal for corporate gatherings or intimate social functions. Depart from typical downtown Chicago, IL hotels and take advantage of the revitalized Courtyard Downtown/River North Hotel located in the heart of Chicago.

description: Experience the energy and sophistication of the big city when you stay at the Hotel Chicago Downtown, Autograph Collection®. Our boutique hotel is located in the heart of the city's River North area, where the excitement never ends. You'll be minutes away from great attractions, including Navy Pier, the Lincoln Park Zoo, the Chicago Theater and Wrigley Field. In addition, this boutique hotel is conveniently located near downtown Chicago's top restaurants, shopping and nightlife, so there's never a dull moment. When it comes to the luxury hotel itself, you'll enjoy comfort and relaxation with flat-screen TV's, 300 thread-count cotton sheets, a fully stocked mini bar, room service, valet parking and a well-equipped fitness center that's always open. Also, you're welcome to plan a business function, social event or family celebration within our 15,000 sq. ft of lovely meeting space that can be customized to fit your needs. Reserve a chic room at Hotel Chicago downtown for your next visit to our great city.

description:
Our new Hilton Garden Inn Chicago/North Loop hotel is located on the north side of Chicago's business loop, close to many businesses and corporations, and offers easy access to both Chicago airports. This downtown hotel is set near River North, just blocks away from the Magnificent Mile with its upscale shops and boutiques. Have a picnic in the nearby Millennium Park, enjoy museums and seasonal events at Navy Pier, or visit one of Lake Michigan beaches. Theatre enthusiast will enjoy our hotel’s proximity to Chicago’s bustling theatre district.

Our full service restaurant serves cooked-to-order breakfast, as well as daily specials for lunch and dinner. In the evening pop into our onsite bar for a relaxing after work cocktail, blow some steam off in the 24-hour gym, or simply unwind in your room and order room service. Host your business meeting at our Chicago Loop hotel that features a boardroom with audio visual rental equipment and a capacity of 10 people conference-style.

description:
Enjoy a warm welcome, stylish accommodations and a convenient location near downtown Chicago when you stay at Hampton Inn Chicago Downtown/N Loop/Michigan Ave. This LEED Certified hotel is ideally situated just two blocks from Millennium Park, and close to lots of businesses, shops, bars, restaurants, beaches and attractions, including Navy Pier and the Magnificent Mile.

All of the bright and spacious guest rooms at this hotel in the Chicago Loop feature free WiFi, a 42-inch flat-screen HDTV, an ergonomic desk and a coffeemaker. Spacious suites are also available, offering more space and wonderful views. Get a great night's sleep in the clean and fresh Hampton bed® before waking up to savor Hampton's free hot breakfast buffet, featuring our famous fresh-baked waffles. If you're heading out early, don't miss the most important meal of the day - pick up a free Hampton's On the Run Breakfast Bag™, Monday - Friday. Pick up snacks, drinks and travel essentials 24/7 in the onsite Suite Shop.

After a busy day, return to our friendly Chicago Loop hotel to enjoy a cocktail or a cold beer in the relaxed Golden Age Lobby Bar. Work out with state-of-the-art cardio equipment in the free 24-hour fitness center. Stay productive in the free 24-hour business center and plan a conference or training session with two versatile meeting rooms and the latest A/V technology.

Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you're not satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% Hampton®.

description:
Visit the Conrad Chicago, a contemporary hotel offering outstanding service, upscale shopping and fine dining in an inviting atmosphere.

Garnished with modern furnishings, a 42-inch flat screen TV, in-room entertainment system and deep soaking tubs— the Conrad Chicago Hotel's spacious Guest Rooms and suites beckon relaxation.

Eat delectable Georgia Coast and South Carolina dishes when dining at one of the hotel’s three establishments—The Terrace Restaurant, The Terrace Bar, and seasonally, The Terrace Rooftop.

Indulge in a glass of wine or an appetizer at the Terrace Bar located on the fifth floor lobby. Step outside onto the fifth floor terrace to enjoy contemporary southern food with views of the skyline at The Terrace Rooftop. Open seasonally, the Terrace Rooftop offers sultry libations, and provides “Movies on the Terrace” each Sunday at sunset from May to September.

With more than 12,000 sq. ft. of event and meeting space, the Conrad Chicago is the ideal venue for hosting social and business events. Choose this luxurious hotel for a wedding tailored to unique styles and preferences. The hotel's experienced wedding planners specialize in making dreams come true.

The 2,000-sq. ft., 24-hour fitness center features strength and cardiovascular machines including treadmills, cross trainers, life cycles and leg and chest press machines.

Visit the Shops at Northbridge— connected to the hotel, or tour famous Chicago attractions including Lincoln Park Zoo, the Children’s Museum and John Hancock Observatory.

Vacation at the Conrad Chicago and be at the center of the city's most prominent activities and attractions.

description:
A fully equipped, all-suite Chicago downtown hotel

The Homewood Suites® by Hilton Chicago-Downtown hotel is an all-suite hotel located in downtown Chicago, in the heart of the city's exciting River North region. We're located just one block west of the Magnificent Mile (North Michigan Avenue), which contains a variety of department stores, restaurants and other luxury retailers. Nearby attractions include the Art Institute of Chicago and Millennium Park, while businesses located near our Chicago downtown hotel include Oracle, Tribune and General Electric.

Swim laps in the hotel's top floor indoor heated swimming pool, or keep fit in the fitness center with cardiovascular machines and weight equipment. Keep up with work in the business center with photocopying and printer access, and stay connected with complimentary internet access throughout the hotel, including in guest suites. All suites at this downtown Chicago hotel have separate living and sleeping rooms, and fully equipped kitchens with full-sized refrigerators, microwave ovens and two-burner stoves.

description:
for big times in the big city...

welcome to the Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago-Downtown hotel.

The Hampton Inn & Suites® hotel in Downtown Chicago is right in the middle of the Windy City. We're just blocks away from many of Chicago's best attractions, from art museums to science centers, to shopping, and family fun. From our hotel in Chicago, you'll be able to blow through the Windy City, visiting famous sites like Millennium Park, Navy Pier and the Magnificent Mile. We're also central to scores of Chicago's top businesses.

Our Downtown Chicago hotel offers great hotel specials and packages for the whole family on vacation or just a quick couple’s getaway.

Regardless of whether you're in town for work or pleasure, our hotel in Downtown Chicago is your most convenient stop. Every morning, guests can enjoy our free Hampton On the House® hot breakfast or if you are in a hurry, grab one of our On the Run™ breakfast bags. There are also plenty of dining options around our Downtown Chicago hotel. We invite you to come stay with us at the Hampton Inn & Suites® hotel in Chicago-Downtown, where you're sure to enjoy big times in the big city.

* Enjoy fine Italian dining at our onsite restaurant Rosebud Trattoria

* Bring the family and enjoy a day at the Chicago Children’s Museum

* Take advantage of our Blue Man Group package

* Tour the city of Chicago on an exciting Segway adventure

* Indulge in your own culinary adventure of Chicago by starting at La Madia

services & amenities

Here at the Hampton Inn Chicago, we're passionate about taking good care of you. That's why we offer a broad range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional. Take a dip in our indoor pool or get a workout in our onsite fitness center. In town on business? Our convenient business center is open 24 hours a day and provides free internet access to help you get your work done.

Whether you're planning a corporate meeting, special event or intimate wedding or need accommodations for a family reunion or your child's sporting group, we're delighted to offer you easy planning and booking tools to make the process quick and organized.

* Take a video tour of our Downtown Chicago hotel

* Meetings & Events in Downtown Chicago

* Downtown Chicago area restaurant guide

* Group rates for your wedding party, sporting team or family reunion

description:
At Embassy Suites Chicago Downtown, you’re in the heart of downtown Chicago, Illinois, surrounded by shopping and entertainment venues on all sides. Located on State Street between Ohio and Ontario Streets, we’re three blocks west of Michigan Avenue's Magnificent Mile, and convenient to the Loop, the financial district and popular attractions. A block away is the free seasonal Navy Pier trolley and subway, linking to local attractions and both Midway and O'Hare airports. A great choice in Chicago hotels, this downtown all-suites property is convenient to Boeing, the Chicago Board of Trade, City Hall, IBM, Prudential Plaza and Sears Tower.

Start the day with complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast. Relax in a two-room suite, complete with a separate lounge, refrigerator, microwave and high-speed internet access. Unwind at our Complimentary Evening Reception, which includes a range of beverages and snacks*. Sample Italian specialties at Osteria Via Stato and Pizzeria Via Stato. Maintain any exercise routine in the complimentary fitness center, and melt away stress in the indoor pool and whirlpool.

Plan your meeting, wedding or special event in the heart of the city for 300 guests at our Chicago hotel, downtown on State Street. In addition to our business center, utilize our video conferencing, webcasting, and teleconferencing services.

*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age

description:
Comfort and sophistication only minutes from Millennium Park The Fairmont Chicago, Millennium Park, in downtown Chicago, provides amenities to suit business and leisure travelers . Comprehensively equipped with a business center and excellent spa facilities, this hotel enables guests to easily combine business with pleasure . A variety of American regional specialties are served in the award-winning Aria Restaurant and Bar . The convenient location of the Fairmont Chicago Millennium Park enables guests to try a wide variety of other dining options in the city . 3 Reasons To Stay: Situated just minutes away from Millennium Park and Magnificent Mile AAA Four-Diamond hotel Fully equipped business center and spa facilities on-siteFairmont Chicago Millennium Park Rooms Accommodations at the Fairmont Chicago Millennium Park take the form of guest rooms, suites and specialty suites . Offering sleek decor and views of the stunning Chicago skyline and surrounding attractions, the rooms are ideal for business travelers and families . Guests on business are provided with convenient amenities, such as high-speed Internet access (fees apply to non-members of the Fairmont President's Club), a work desk and a telephone . For families requiring extra space, large suites with a bedroom conversion are available on request . All guest rooms at the Fairmont Chicago Millennium Park are equipped with television, temperature control facilities and refreshments . A selection of bathroom amenities is available in every room for extra comfort and convenience . Extra facilities and services, such as a press down service and family facilities, for example cribs, are available on request . Things To Do: Millennium Park (0 . 5 mi/0 . 9 km) Magnificent Mile (1 . 7 mi/2 . 8 km) North Bridge (0 . 7 mi/1 . 2 km) The Art Institute (0 . 8 mi/1 . 2 km) Field Museum (1 . 6 mi/2 . 5 km) Shedd Aquarium (1 . 7 mi/2 . 7 km) Adler Planetarium (2 . 2 mi/3 . 5 km) Soldier Field (2 . 6 mi/4 . 1 km)

Indoor Valet Parking is $70 a night . We are not able to guarantee bed types prior to arrival .

description: The Courtyard Marriott Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile features a stylish lobby with a Starbucks coffee shop, inviting fireplace and plenty of comfortable seating to watch the bustling activity of the famous Mag Mile. Our experienced concierge and interactive GoBoard® will keep you up to speed on the latest news, traffic and downtown Chicago happenings. Pamper yourself with an indoor pool & fitness facility, an upscale restaurant, as well as over 3,700 sq ft of meeting space, nine meeting rooms, on-site catering, and free WiFi in your guestroom and throughout the lobby. description: Welcome to our Holiday Inn Express Magnificent Mile Hotel. Our downtown Chicago hotel , conveniently located off Michigan Avenue on the Magnificent Mile, is situated in the heart of Chicago near several businesses and attractions. Business travelers will appreciate our downtown Chicago hotel location near major companies such as Deloitte, Boeing, AT&T, Sun Microsystems, Computer Sciences Corp. and Northwestern Hospital . Flying into Chicago? Our Chicago hotel is close to O'Hare (18 miles) and Midway (12 miles) Airports, saving time for the busy executive. Staying at this landmark Chicago hotel will make it easy to visit popular Chicago attractions like the Shedd Aquarium, the Art Institute, Navy Pier, Lincoln Park Zoo and Millennium Park . Just 2 blocks away from Michigan Ave, Chicago's Magnificent Mile, where you can indulge in shopping at the Water Tower Place, Nordstrom Mall, plus more shops to choose from. The historic Holiday Inn Express Magnificent Mile hotel has 174 guestrooms and 1 suite. The public areas reflect 1920s Beaux Arts' architecture and feature a great room with comfortable seating areas for the complimentary Express Start breakfast. Our Chicago hotel provides a chic, urban setting that is Wi-Fi friendly, stylishly updated and convenient to downtown businesses and attractions. Whether you visit Chicago for business or vacation travel, stay comfortably at our Magnificent Mile hotel.

description: Choose Chicago, and choose this great downtown location. Just 1 block east of Michigan Avenue, and the glittering Magnificent Mile with block upon block of fabulous shopping and dining. Red Roof Downtown Chicago is within an easy walking distance to attractions like the famous Navy Pier, Lakeshore Drive, Soldier Field, Boat Tours, Watertower Place, American Girl Place, House of Blues, The Chicago Art Institute, Marina City, the Redhead Piano Bar, and fun dining at the Hard Rock Cafe, Rock n Roll McDonalds, Ed Debevics, Chicago Chop House, Rock Bottom Restaurant, Pizzeria Uno, Grand Lux Cafe, and Lawrys Prime Rib, to name just a few. Steps away from bus lines, El train lines, and close to the Metra Train lines, you can easily reach points farther north and south, like Wrigley Field, US Cellular Field, and all the attractions in the Chicago suburbs. So convenient to Michigan Avenue shopping and major attractions in River North, the Theater District, and beyond. This location offers valet parking for $44 for standard vehicles for a 24-hour period with in and out privileges. The parking garage accepts passenger cars only. This hotel has a friendly staff ready to welcome you.

description:
Welcome to our Embassy Suites Chicago - Downtown/Lakefront hotel. Enjoy the convenience of our downtown Chicago hotel near Navy Pier, Magnificent Mile, Chicago River and Chicago's finest attractions.

Showcasing spectacular views of downtown Chicago, the Embassy Suites Chicago - Downtown/Lakefront hotel near Michigan Avenue features upscale sophistication and more space to unwind and be yourself. Enjoy a relaxing stay in one of our spacious 455 suites featuring a private bedroom, separate living area with sofa sleeper, two 37-inch televisions, a refrigerator and a microwave.

Enjoy our nightly Manager’s Reception* in our bright and spacious open-air atrium featuring contemporary design, a 75 ft. long live eco wall and grand views of the city. Indulge in a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast each morning.

Host a special event or business meeting in our 20,000 sq. ft. of meeting space or celebrate a special occasion in the elegant Chicago River Ballroom. After an exciting day discovering Chicago, unwind at the heated indoor pool and whirlpool, relax in the sauna or rejuvenate in our well-equipped fitness center.

*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

description: The James Chicago - which received recognition on Travel and Leisures Worlds Best Awards - is located on the corner of Rush and Ontario streets steps from Chicagos famous Michigan Avenue shopping district and renowned museums . Perfect for corporate and social events - The James features 7000 square feet of naturally lit state-of-the-art special event space from leather upholstered seating to the latest in technology such as built-in surround sound and HD SMART TVs .  Experience The James as a culinary destination with David Burkes Primehouse - named No .  1 Steakhouse in Chicago by Chicago magazine and craft cocktail lounge JIMMY .  All corporate events provide restaurant-style dining menus custom created by the acclaimed steakhouse .  Other highlights include space accommodations ranging from 10 to 300 guests; on-site audio/visual team; complimentary business networking lounge; and a dedicated Conference Services Manager to ensure the success of each event from start to finish regardless of the size .

description:
Experience the Windy City from a convenient location just minutes from Michigan Avenue and Navy Pier!

The award-winning BEST WESTERN River North Hotel is an affordable and convenient choice for business and leisure travelers alike. Offering great rates, this downtown Chicago hotel makes it easy to explore the city's most famous attractions, from Navy Pier to Willis Tower. World-class shopping along Michigan Avenue's Magnificent Mile is just six blocks away.

Some of Chicago's most famous museums are less than two miles away, and visitors of all ages delight in exploring Shedd Aquarium, the Adler Planetarium and the Field Museum of Natural History. And what visit to Chicago is complete without a ball game? Whether its baseball, basketball or football, this Chicago Best Western is within five miles of Wrigley Field, Soldier Field, The United Center and US Cellular Field.

Business travelers appreciate that this Chicago hotel is conveniently located near educational, medial and machinery businesses, the Chicago Financial District, and the Chicago Loop Business District. Chicago O'Hare International Airport is just 12 miles away from this Chicago hotel.

The BEST WESTERN River North Hotel is known for its great service, friendly staff, cleanliness and amenities that make guests feel at home. Our nicely appointed, contemporary rooms and suites offer cable TV with HBO®, high-speed Wi-Fi, room service, a coffee maker and much more. After a busy day in the bustling city, guests at this Chicago hotel can enjoy a deep-dish pizza at our onsite restaurant, take a dip in our indoor pool, or relax on the sun deck and take in the marvelous city views.

Find out why we have been awarded a Trip Advisor Certificate of Excellence when you book your stay at the BEST WESTERN River North Hotel! Enjoy your stay.

description:
Feel welcome the moment you arrive at Hampton Inn Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile. Located only moments from exciting shopping and dining opportunities on the Magnificent Mile, this modern Chicago hotel offers wonderful views of Lake Michigan and Michigan Avenue. We are just across the street from Northwestern Memorial Hospital, the Rehabilitation Institute of Chicago and Lurie Children's Hospital, and offer easy access to lots of museums and family-friendly attractions.

Settle in to a modern and spacious guest room at this Magnificent Mile hotel in Chicago, Illinois. Check emails with free WiFi, browse HD channels on the 36-inch flat-screen TV and get a great night's sleep in the clean and fresh Hampton bed®. Comfortable suites are also available, with a mini-refrigerator and sofa bed. Start each day with Hampton's free hot breakfast buffet, or grab a Hampton's On the Run Breakfast bag™, Monday through Friday. Savor delicious English and American cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner in the Elephant and Castle restaurant. Buy snacks and sundries in the handy onsite Suite Shop. Swim in the seasonal outdoor pool as you enjoy wonderful lake and city views, or work out in the free fitness center - both located on the hotel's 40th floor. Print documents in the 24-hour business center and hold a business event for up to 80 people with three meeting rooms and customizable catering menus.

Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you're not satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% Hampton®.

description:
This Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile is superbly located and guests are within walking distance from the city's top shopping districts such as The Water Tower Place Mall, Shops at 900, Oak Street, and Michigan Avenue, as well as hundreds of restaurant options. Our Downtown Chicago hotel is just four blocks from the Chicago St. CTA Red Line and 1.5 miles from Union Station.

No matter how long you're staying, our welcoming staff will be on hand to make this all-suite hotel your home away from home. Enjoy your favorite meal cooked in the fully equipped kitchen, surf the web with free WiFi access or simply relax in front of one of the TVs. Start the day with our complimentary hot full breakfast, and unwind with free evening dinner and drinks*, available Monday through Thursday. Swim in the seasonal rooftop pool located on the 40th floor, and tone up in the fitness center.

*Local and state laws apply.

description:
Located at Water Tower Park on the Magnificent Mile, the city's premier shopping district, The Peninsula Chicago is the city's most luxurious and sophisticated hotel, offering guests all possible amenities and services . The Peninsula Chicago is a proud recipient of the Forbes Five Star and the AAA Five Diamond awards, for more than ten consecutive years in addition to numerous other awards .

The Peninsula Chicago's 339 luxurious guestrooms and suites are among the largest in the city and are exquisitely furnished in a contemporary yet classical style, with a state-of-the-art electronic system that provides guests the ability to control guestroom features with the touch of a button .

At the top of The Peninsula Chicago, you'll find the world-renowned Peninsula Spa . An intimate, indulgent environment featuring innovative spa treatments, gracious service and magnificent facilities including a half-Olympic length swimming pool on the 19th floor overlooking the Chicago skyline .

With three distinctive restaurants and a bar, guests can choose from a diverse array of superb dining options . Shanghai Terrace is notable as much for its intensely flavored Shanghainese and Cantonese delicacies as for its matchless service and 1930s supper club atmosphere; The Lobby provides approachable, contemporary American cuisine for dinner, an all-day dining menu and our delectable afternoon tea and weekend chocolate bar all presented in elegant surroundings; The Bar offers a sophisticated menu of cocktails, wines and flights of scotch; and Pierrot Gourmet is a European-style caf and wine bar ideal for casual, light fare .
